name: Deathchase Clone
description:
Deathchase

9 - Accelerate
8 - Brake
1 - Turn Left
0 - Turn Right
Space - Shoot

Try and avoid the trees and shoot down the two enemy motorbike riders. You must be close enough that your range indicator blinks in order to hit them. Earn $ (score) by driving and get $1000 every time you defeat an enemy. Earn an extra $2000 or $3500 for shooting down the tank or the helicopter. Every other level is a night patrol, and each consecutive day adds more trees to avoid.
How high of a score can you get?

This project was created over a 1-week period. The recreation features textures based on the original Deathchase(1983), but created by Jordan Grayson. Programming written by Jordan Grayson. Font created by and licensed from Ray Larabie.
